text: aur yadi allaah aapako koee duhkh pahunchaana chaahe, to usake siva koee use door karane vaala nahin aur yadi aapako koee bhalaee pahunchaana chaahe, to koee usakee bhalaee ko rokane vaala nahin. vah apanee daya apane bhakton mein se jisapar chaahe, karata hai tatha vah kshamaasheel dayaavaan hai
